content: Loomi Co.'s keeping the routes steady. So whenever a planet comes by, just hop in and drive over to visit! Super convenient, swoosh~!
info: 介绍站牌-艾莎莎尼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: The planet's growing so fast, and now we can even spot other planets out there! Just look up. See that one? Over there!
info: 介绍站牌-艾莎莎尼-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Of course, friends may also drop by from time to time. If you'd rather not be disturbed, just mark yourself as "Do Not Disturb" at the station board.
info: 介绍站牌-艾莎莎尼-复杂对话_主流程文本II
